content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5))
- Boiler is connected to pipes at positions (109.5, -31.5) and (113.5, -31.5)
- Offshore pump is connected to pipes at position (107.5, -34.5)
- Steam engine is connected to pipes at positions (117.5, -33.0) and (117.5, -28.0)
- Electricity is distributed through a small electric pole at position (119.5, -30.5)

### Furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a furnace with no ingredients to smelt

### Pipe network for water at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (109.5, -33.5), (109.5, -32.5), and (109.5, -31.5)

### Pipe network for steam at position (117.5, -34.5)
Consists of pipes at positions (117.5, -34.5), (118.5, -34.5), (119.5, -34.5), and others

### Belt at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of a belt going up from position (63.5, -53.5)

### Belt at position (64.5, -53.5)
Consists of a belt going up from position (64.5, -53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Make sure to check the entity's inventory before inserting items
- Ensure that the item to be inserted is available in the agent's inventory

### Errors when using entities without fuel
- Make sure to add fuel to entities that require it, such as boilers
- Check the entity's status to ensure it is working properly

### NAMESPACE
- No utility functions have been defined by the agent
- Important variables:
  - `transport-belt`: 8
  - `small-electric-pole`: 1
  - `wood`: 7
  - `iron-ore`: 10
  - `copper-ore`: 10
  - `iron-plate`: 7
  - `copper-plate`: 5
  - `copper-cable`: 2
  - `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
